duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting adults with autism to achieve their goals as identified in their Person Centered Plan (PCP)
Provide and educate clients on transportation options
Actively participate in training opportunities and in-service education activities
Communicate effectively using established chain of communication with clients, families and Program Supervisors

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, or equivalent experience. CPR/First Aid, Driver’s license and vehicle required. Bachelor’s Degree preferred, or equivalent experience. Itineris trained trainer. CESP and/or RBT certified. Microsoft Office skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
